name: Wheel of Slime
description:
WHEEL! OF! SLIME!

Hello and welcome to everybody's favorite Slime-themed Game Show... WHEEL OF SLIME!

Up to 3 people can play to win for the grand prize of slime! Pass the controller (or keyboard) around for hours* of fun!

1, 2, 3, and 4 are actions on the keyboard, and A, B, X, and Y do the same on the gamepad!

The start button, space bar, and the Z key all skip ahead to the next line of dialogue, but be careful doing this in Chrome, it may mess things up a bit!
